Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Addison
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Addison, Pulaski, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Addison, Pulaski, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
